headline: Lowe’s debuts AI-powered virtual advisor tool
summary: Lowe's has launched 'ask Mylow,' an AI-powered virtual advisor to help with home improvement projects.The tool offers real-time answers and was developed in collaboration with OpenAI, according to a...
